title: 1926년 Elder 사건
summary: 미국 Georgia, GA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Elder. 판결일: 1926-11-24. 법원: Supreme Court of Georgia.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Elder v. Galloway
**판결일**: 1926-11-24
**법원**: Supreme Court of Georgia
**관할**: Georgia, GA

**판사**: Hill

## 변호인

W. H. Terrell, for plaintiff., Hendrix & Buchanan, for defendants.

## 인용

- 163 Ga. 276

## 판결문 요약


Hill, J.
The court did not err in sustaining the general demurrers to the petition, and in dismissing the case.

Judgment affirmed.


All the Justices concur, except Russell, O. J., who dissents.

...
